Question
========
What is the mean course 2.2 grade (variable: course 2_2) for students who obtained a score lower than 5.5 for the course exam of 1. 3 (variable course: 1_3) and who partly agreed (score = 5) with statement 2 (variable: statement2)? Write down the answer in the answer box (with 3 decimal places).

**Download**: [SPSS file](eur-descriptive-250-en-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-descriptive-250-en-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is 5.114.
